DalamudMuteHelp.message: Mute a word or sentence from appearing in chat. Usage: /xlmute <word or sentence>

DalamudUnmuteHelp.message: Unmute a word or sentence. Usage: /xlunmute <word or sentence>

DalamudLastLinkHelp.message: Open the last posted link in your default browser.

DalamudBotJoinHelp.message: Add the XIVLauncher discord bot you set up to your server.

DalamudBgmSetHelp.message: Set the Game background music. Usage: /xlbgmset <BGM ID>

DalamudBonusHelp.message: Notify when a roulette has a bonus you specified. Run without parameters for more info. Usage: /xlbonus <roulette name> <role name>

DalamudLanguageHelp.message: Set the language for the in-game addon and plugins that support it. Available languages:

DalamudSettingsHelp.message: Change various In-Game-Addon settings like chat channels and the discord bot setup.

DalamudBugReport.message: Upload a log to be analyzed by our professional development team.

DalamudMuteNoArgs.message: Please provide a word to mute.

DalamudBotNotSetup.message: The XIVLauncher discord bot was not set up correctly or could not connect to discord. Please check the settings and the FAQ.

DalamudChannelNotSetup.message: You have not set up a discord channel for these notifications - you will only receive them in chat. To do this, please use the XIVLauncher in-game settings.

DalamudBonusPossibleValues.message:
Possible values for roulette: leveling, 506070, msq, guildhests, expert, trials, mentor, alliance, normal
Possible values for role: tank, dps, healer, all, none/reset

InstallerHint.message:
This window allows you install and remove in-game plugins.
They are made by third-party developers.

InstallerNoCompatible.message: No compatible plugins were found :( Please restart your game and try again.

InstallerErrorHint.message:
The plugin installer ran into an issue or the plugin is incompatible.
Please restart the game and report this error on our discord.

DalamudSettingsLanguageHint.message: Select the language Dalamud will be displayed in.

DalamudSettingsChannelHint.message: Select the chat channel that is to be used for general Dalamud messages.

DalamudSettingsFlash.message: Flash FFXIV window on duty pop

DalamudSettingsFlashHint.message: Select, if the FFXIV window should be flashed in your task bar when a duty is ready.

DalamudSettingsDutyFinderMessageHint.message: Select, if a message should be sent in the FFXIV chat when a duty is ready.

DalamudSettingsGlobalUiScaleHint.message: Scale all XIVLauncher UI elements - useful for 4K displays.

DalamudSettingToggleUiHide.message: Hide plugin UI when the game UI is hidden

DalamudSettingToggleUiHideHint.message: Check this box to hide any open windows by plugins when toggling the game overlay.

DalamudSettingsRestartHint.message: You need to restart your game after changing these settings.

DalamudSettingsPluginTestHint.message: Check this box to receive testing prereleases for plugins.

DalamudSettingDalamudTestHint.message: Check this box to receive testing prereleases for Dalamud.

DalamudUpdated.message: The In-Game addon has been updated or was reinstalled successfully! Please check the discord for a full changelog.

DalamudPluginUpdateRequired.message: One or more of your plugins needs to be updated. Please use the /xlplugins command in-game to update them!

DalamudPluginUpdateCheckFail.message: Could not check for plugin updates.
